sql: SELECT post_date, COUNT(*) AS count FROM tender GROUP BY post_date order by post_date DESC limit 10;

description: 查询当日已爬取的页面数
sql: select count(id) from tender where post_date = date('now') and html is not null order by id;
select count(id) from tender where post_date = date('now');
select id, weight, title, href from tender where weight > 0 and post_date = date('now') order by weight desc, post_date desc ,area limit 30;
